import React, { useState } from "react"; import { alter } from "./frstprojectarray"; export const Update=(edit)=>{ const[pos,setpos]=useState(edit.where) const[fun,setfun]=useState({ "foodname":edit.mention.foodname, "cstarters":edit.mention.cstarters, "cdesert":edit.mention.cdesert, "price":edit.mention.price }) const tracks=(hey)=>{ const{value}=hey.target fun.cstarters.push(value) } const yet=(aarthi01)=>{ const{name,value}=aarthi01.target setfun( (back)=>{ return{ ...back, [name]:value } } ) } const sweetie=()=>{ alter(pos,person) alert("Updated") } const candy=()=>{ alert("Rejected") } return( <>

Chicken Briyani
Mutton Briyani

Chilli Chicken Chicken Sukka Grill Chicken Pepper Chicken




) }
